languages.text: "Думаю, Грегорас в конце концов оказался просто человеком. Он был заперт в Просторе, ему приходилось охранять всю десятину сектора — он нуждался в ком-то, чья мудрость облегчила бы его бремя".

"I think that in the end, Gregoras's actions were only human. Trapped in the Koronus Expanse, he was faced with the task of guarding the entirety of the sector's tithe — he needed the wisdom of someone who could lighten his load."
languages.original_text: "Думаю, Грегорас в конце концов оказался просто человеком. Он был заперт в Просторе, ему приходилось охранять всю десятину сектора — он нуждался в ком-то, чья мудрость облегчила бы его бремя".

traits.locale_text: "I think that in the end, Gregoras's actions were only human. Trapped in the Koronus Expanse, he was faced with the task of guarding the entirety of the sector's tithe — he needed someone's wisdom to lighten his load."

"I think that in the end, Gregoras's actions were only human. Trapped in the Koronus Expanse, he was faced with the task of guarding the entirety of the sector's tithe — he needed someone's wisdom to lighten his load."

"I think that in the end, Gregoras's actions were only human. Trapped in the Koronus Expanse, he was faced with the task of guarding the entirety of the sector's tithe — he needed the wisdom of someone who could lighten his load."

languages.text: 「結局のところ、グレゴラスの行動は人間的だったと思います。コロヌス・エクスパンスに閉じ込められ、星域全体の租税を守るという重責を負わされていた彼には、その重荷を少しでも軽くしてくれるような知恵を持つ誰かが必要だったのです」
languages.original_text: "I think that in the end, Gregoras's actions were only human. Trapped in the Koronus Expanse, he was faced with the task of guarding the entirety of the sector's tithe — he needed the wisdom of someone who could lighten his load."

traits.locale_text: 「結局のところ、グレゴラスの行動は人間的だったと思います。コロヌス・エクスパンスに閉じ込められ、星域全体の租税を守るという重責を負わされていた彼には、その重荷を少しでも軽くしてくれるような知恵を持つ誰かが必要だったのです」

languages.text: "Ich denke, dass Gregoras' Handeln letztlich nur menschlich war. Er war gefangen in der Koronus-Ausdehnung und hatte die Aufgabe, den gesamten Zehnt des Sektors zu bewachen – er brauchte die Weisheit von jemandem, der seine Bürde erleichtern konnte."
languages.original_text: "I think that in the end, Gregoras's actions were only human. Trapped in the Koronus Expanse, he was faced with the task of guarding the entirety of the sector's tithe — he needed the wisdom of someone who could lighten his load."

traits.locale_text: "Ich denke, dass Gregoras' Handeln letztlich nur menschlich war. Er war gefangen in der Koronus-Ausdehnung und hatte die Aufgabe, den gesamten Zehnt des Sektors zu bewachen – er brauchte die Weisheit von jemandem, der seine Bürde erleichtern konnte."

languages.text: « Au fond, je pense que les actions de Gregoras ont été profondément humaines. Piégé dans les Étendues de Koronus, il a hérité de la lourde tâche de protéger la dîme d'un secteur entier : il avait besoin de la sagesse de quelqu'un capable d'alléger son fardeau. »
languages.original_text: "I think that in the end, Gregoras's actions were only human. Trapped in the Koronus Expanse, he was faced with the task of guarding the entirety of the sector's tithe — he needed the wisdom of someone who could lighten his load."

traits.locale_text: « Au fond, je pense que les actions de Gregoras ont été profondément humaines. Piégé dans les Étendues de Koronus, il a hérité de la lourde tâche de protéger la dîme d'un secteur entier : il avait besoin de la sagesse de quelqu'un capable d'alléger son fardeau. »

languages.text: «Creo que, a la postre, Gregoras erró como humano que era. Atrapado en la Extensión de Koronus, se enfrentó a la tarea de proteger el diezmo del sector entero; necesitaba la sabiduría de alguien que pudiese aliviarle semejante carga».
languages.original_text: "I think that in the end, Gregoras's actions were only human. Trapped in the Koronus Expanse, he was faced with the task of guarding the entirety of the sector's tithe — he needed the wisdom of someone who could lighten his load."

traits.locale_text: «Creo que, a la postre, Gregoras erró como humano que era. Atrapado en la Extensión de Koronus, se enfrentó a la tarea de proteger el diezmo del sector entero; necesitaba la sabiduría de alguien que pudiese aliviarle semejante carga».

languages.text: “我认为，说到底，格雷戈拉斯也仅仅是个普通的人类。他被困在科罗努斯扩区，肩负着守护整个扩区什一税的任务。在这种处境之下，他需要其他人的智慧来减轻他的负担。”
languages.original_text: "I think that in the end, Gregoras's actions were only human. Trapped in the Koronus Expanse, he was faced with the task of guarding the entirety of the sector's tithe — he needed the wisdom of someone who could lighten his load."

traits.locale_text: “我认为，说到底，格雷戈拉斯也仅仅是个普通的人类。他被困在科罗努斯扩区，肩负着守护整个扩区什一税的任务。在这种处境之下，他需要其他人的智慧来减轻他的负担。”

languages.text: "Gregoras'ın eylemlerinin nihayetinde pek insanca olduğunu düşünüyorum. Koronus Enginliği'nde kapana kısılmış hâlde, sektördeki tüm aşarı koruma görevini üstlenmek zorundaydı. Yükünü hafifletebilecek birinin bilgeliğine ihtiyacı vardı."
languages.original_text: "I think that in the end, Gregoras's actions were only human. Trapped in the Koronus Expanse, he was faced with the task of guarding the entirety of the sector's tithe — he needed the wisdom of someone who could lighten his load."
